name: Pixel Platformer (WildWorkshop207)
description:
Pixel Platformer is a game where you are trying to find your way home, the only way back is by crossing through the plains, the forest, and the ruins. there are also spikes everywhere so good luck.

this game was made for My First Game Jam: Winter 2023

Warning: this game has a steep difficulty curve, if you haven't had that much experience with platforming games you may find later parts of this game too difficult.

Controls:

[A] [D] / [Arrow Keys] - Move

[W] / [Space] / [Up Arrow] - Jump

[Left Shift] / [Right Shift] - Dash (Unlocked in forest)

Includes:

- 3 different areas, each one increasing in difficulty and length (and spike count)

- 6 secret paint buckets that you can use to change your characters color

- A Hard Mode with twice as many spikes, because why not :)
